channel.title: Tops on datastrophic
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on datastrophic

item.description: About Hi! It’s Anton here and I’m the author of datastrophic.io. I’m a technical leader and a software engineer specializing on distributed systems, data platforms, and AI infrastructure. You can call me a veteran as my tenure in the industry passed the mark of 15 years during which I was working on high-load, distributed, big data, workload and container orchestration systems. If you’d like to connect or to learn more about my background - the best way to do it is via LinkedIn.
